message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal use. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product for $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking for a better deal. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer of $10500 for the product. This is my best offer considering the value and quality of the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. However, I am still looking for a better deal. I would like to counteroffer at $10000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value and the discussions we've had, I am willing to offer the product for $10250. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $10000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $10000 for the product. This brings us to a mutually beneficial agreement.
